interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: The Little Mermaid (Two-Disc Diamond Edition: Blu-ray / DVD + Digital Copy)
Review Date: 2013/10/30
Store: Jodi Benson  (Actor),     Christopher Daniel Barnes  (Actor),     Ron Clements  (Director, Writer),     John Musker  (Director, Writer)    &                   1                  more   Rated:    G    Format: Blu-ray
Categories: Movies & TV, Featured Categories, Blu-ray, Kids & Family
Product Description: ['THE LITTLE MERMAID, one of the most celebrated animated films of all time, is now spectacularly transformed for the first time on Blu-ray, with a state-of-the-art digitally restored picture and brilliant high-definition sound! Venture under the sea where Ariel, a free-spirited mermaid princess, longs to be part of the human world. After bravely striking a bargain with Ursula, a sneaky sea witch, Ariel embarks on the adventure of a lifetime. With Flounder and Sebastian at her side, Ariel will need all of her courage and determination to make things right in both her worlds.']
Average Rating: 4.8
Product Details: {'Genre': 'Kids & Family, Action & Adventure', 'Format': 'AC-3, Blu-ray, Color, Multiple Formats, Dubbed, Dolby, Animated, DTS Surround Sound, NTSC, Subtitled, Widescreen, Digital_copyAC-3, Blu-ray, Color, Multiple Formats, Dubbed, Dolby, Animated, DTS Surround Sound, NTSC, Subtitled, Widescreen, Digital_copy   See more', 'Contributor': 'Buddy Hackett, Samuel E. Wright, Pat Carroll, Christopher Daniel Barnes, Edie McClurg, Jodi Benson, Ron Clements, Will Ryan, Kenneth Mars, Rene Auberjonois, John Musker, Paddi Edwards, Jason Marin, Ben WrightBuddy Hackett, Samuel E. Wright, Pat Carroll, Christopher Daniel Barnes, Edie McClurg, Jodi Benson, Ron Clements, Will Ryan, Kenneth Mars, Rene Auberjonois, John Musker, Paddi Edwards, Jason Marin, Ben Wright   See more', 'Language': 'French (Dolby Digital 5.1), Spanish (Dolby Digital 5.1), English (DTS-HD High Res Audio)', 'Runtime': '1 hour and 23 minutes', 'Aspect Ratio': '1.78:1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'G (General Audience)', 'Product Dimensions': '7.5 x 0.7 x 5.4 inches; 8.32 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'WD11171300BR', 'Director': 'Ron Clements, John Musker', 'Media Format': 'AC-3, Blu-ray, Color, Multiple Formats, Dubbed, Dolby, Animated, DTS Surround Sound, NTSC, Subtitled, Widescreen, Digital_copy', 'Run time': '1 hour and 23 minutes', 'Release date': 'October 1, 2013', 'Actors': 'Jodi Benson, Christopher Daniel Barnes, Rene Auberjonois, Pat Carroll, Paddi Edwards', 'Dubbed': 'Spanish, French', 'Subtitles': 'French, Spanish, English', 'Studio': 'Walt Disney Studios Home Entertainment', 'Writers': 'Ron Clements, John Musker', 'Number of discs': '2'}
Review Text: Bought a few of these for Christmas gifts and one for my own daughter. Looks great and still as fun as it was when I was a kid! Some of the best Disney songs ever in this film.
Review Title: Who doesn't love The Little Mermaid?
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
{'Subtitles': ['None available'], 'Directors': ["Darragh O'Connell", 'Timothy Björklund'], 'Producers': ['Kate Boutilier', 'Eryk Casemiro', 'Patricia Resnick', 'Cathal Gaffney', 'Gillian Higgins', 'Karen Ialacci', 'Megan Laughton', 'Diana Manson'], 'Starring': ['Olivia']}
Really wish this show was still on the air! It's clever in a way that makes me laugh almost as much as my daughter. Adorable!
Olivia is adorable
{'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'foul language'], 'Audio languages': ['English', 'English [Audio Description]'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Brian Percival', 'David Evans', 'Philip John', 'Andy Goddard', 'Catherine Morshead', 'Minkie Spiro', 'Brian Kelly', 'Michael Engler', 'Ben Bolt', 'Ashley Pearce'], 'Starring': ['Huge Bonneville', 'Michelle Dockery', 'Maggie Smith'], 'Studio': ['BritBox']}
I didn't really understand the hoopla surrounding this show. From the outside it just looked like a show about a bunch of stuffy nobles, but one episode and I was hooked! Great show!
Now I get it...

profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Content Preferences:** Continues to enjoy clever and humorous programming that appeals to all ages, particularly family-friendly content that engages everyone. This user exhibits a strong nostalgia for classic animated films, emphasizing a love for timeless storytelling.

- **Viewership Patterns:** Retains a preference for animated and family-oriented shows, while increasingly exploring sophisticated or period-themed content, allowing for a varied entertainment experience. This includes a fondness for musicals and classic tales that blend fun with deeper messages.

- **Emotional Engagement:** Maintains a deep emotional connection to shows and films that resonate with familial experiences. The recent review highlights an appreciation for engaging narratives that evoke sentimental memories and shared enjoyment during family viewing.

- **Sentiment Analysis:** Shows a consistently positive sentiment towards diverse content. The enthusiastic recent interactions indicate a strong endorsement for quality storytelling, with a focus on films that can be enjoyed across generations.

- **Younger Audience Appeal:** While still preferring content that entertains younger audiences, this user appreciates clever narratives that include mature themes, showcasing an evolving taste that captures both children's and adult's interest.

Overall, this user embraces a delightful mix of charming family-friendly programming and sophisticated narratives that foster familial connections, laughter, and nostalgia, while also being open to new viewing adventures.
